MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG1 postcode area of Parkgate. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm to adjust electrical equipment on the overhead line and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.05pm on Tuesday 3rd November 2020.
